scripts.karma-bundled: cd js-test && webpack --mode=development --define ASPNET_DATA_SCRIPT='../js/dx.aspnet.data.js' test.js -o test-bundle.js && karma start --bundled
scripts.karma-bundled-nojquery: cd js-test && webpack --mode=development --define ASPNET_DATA_SCRIPT='../js-nojquery/index.js' test.js -o test-bundle.js && karma start --bundled
scripts.karma-bundled-nojquery-cjs: cd js-test && webpack --mode=development --define ASPNET_DATA_SCRIPT='../js-nojquery/index.js' --define define=false test.js -o test-bundle.js && karma start --bundled
scripts.dts: cd js-test && tsc check-ts-compilation.ts && tsc check-ts-compilation.nojquery.ts
